img_summary: The image depicts the "Willow Wood Staff," a weapon featured in the game "Black Myth: Wukong." According to the context provided, this staff is the default weapon at the start of Chapter 1 and is not craftable. The preceding and following text describe other weapons in the game, indicating that the image serves to visually represent the Willow Wood Staff within a list or catalog of available weapons.
